HomePage.name: Ayush Prajapati
HomePage.description: I design and build websites that look good, and work well.

AboutPage.AboutParagraph: I am a budding web developer with a passion for creating beautiful and functional websites. I have completed courses in React JS and have built a number of personal projects to gain experience in web development. With a keen eye for design and a commitment to delivering high-quality work, I am excited to take on new challenges and grow as a developer.

Projects.title: TODO List
Projects.Description: It is my initial project. Simple TODO List created with update and delete task feature. Made with the help of React JS.

Projects.title: REST COUNTRIES API
Projects.Description: It shows 4 continent's country information including their capital,population and time zone with the help of rest countries API.

Projects.title: AIRBNB CLONE
Projects.Description: It is AIRBNB's frontend part's clone.Purpose of this project is to improve my frontend skill.

Projects.title: INSTAGRAM CLONE
Projects.Description: It is INSTAGRAM's frontend part.Made using React JS with advanced skills.

Projects.title: TRAVELLOG
Projects.Description: MERN Stack project with login,sign up,hotel checking and booking services

Projects.title: TRAVELLOG ADMIN
Projects.Description: MERN Stack project with admin service.
